t: r/frugalmalefashion on Reddit: Bostonian Made in USA PTB | $138 down from $460
s: January 21, 2021 - Bostonian is a heritage brand that has been around for the better part of a decade. Formerly, they made shoes here. The 16 was their staple last. When they brought back USA manufacturing in 2018, naturally the shoes are priced accordingly. They were small batched, and sold out quickly at the MSRP of $460. This isn’t a fake MSRP. It was literally what they sold for on the Bostonian site. Amazon ...

t: These Bostonian brand shoes are a good deal!
s: I’m a fan of the Bostonian brand. They are a good deal for an all-leather shoe, including the sole. This is my second pair of Bostonian shoes and like the first, these (double-monk strap) are comfortable and stylish. And, because they are made of all leather, they can be repaired and refurbished ...
